propositions.text: 我只想做一个平平凡凡的普通人，普普通通地生活，过完自己平凡的一生。
可我似乎没有这个权利。
这个世界，我是唯一一个能够操控时空之门的人。
这个世界，拥有我，就等于拥有了所有。
我来到这世界上，已经有一段时间了。
我不知道该怎么去形容这里，这里有我喜欢的、不喜欢的，也有我喜欢的、不喜欢的。
我只想做个普通人，普通人，普通人。
网上看到的，感觉还挺有意思的，就搬过来了，希望大家喜欢。

concepts.name: 女王
concepts.context: The narrator explicitly states they do not want to be a queen.

concepts.name: 王后
concepts.context: The narrator explicitly states they do not want to be a queen consort.

concepts.name: 普通人
concepts.context: The narrator's primary desire is to live a normal, ordinary life as a common person.
The narrator is the sole person who can control the 'gate of time and space', implying a unique and powerful ability.

concepts.name: 世界
concepts.context: The narrator possesses and controls the world, a central theme of their predicament.

concepts.name: 权利
concepts.context: The narrator feels they lack the right to live a simple, ordinary life.

concepts.name: 时间
concepts.context: The narrator mentions having been in this world for 'some time'.

concepts.name: 喜欢
concepts.context: The narrator's feelings about the world are complex, encompassing both likes and dislikes.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured with a main title, a brief introduction, and then a repetitive 'Novel Content' section divided into chapters. Each chapter presents variations of the same core statements about the narrator's desire to be a normal person and their unique power over the world.
